name: RKN - Roskomnadzor Banned Internet
description:
RKN - Roskomnadzor Banned Internet - A game where you will have the opportunity to feel yourself in the role of Roskomnadzor and with the help of a cannon that shoots bans to block as many Telegram servers as possible, only you will not get it, and instead you will receive your bans back.
Gather as little as possible a score of firing at enemies, and getting your shots back at you! And all this for a funny song that will not let you get bored)
